job.title: Junior Software Engineer - Location Flexible
job.description: ltstronggtcompany descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is a leading global collaboration platform thats transforming the way people work together from the smallest business to the largest enterprise with more than million registered users across more than countries our mission is to design a more enlightened way of working from our headquarters in san francisco to eight dedicated studios and a worldwide team of employees who choose where they work best our virtual first approach is leading the way into the future of workltpgtltbrgt ltstronggtteam descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltbrgt ltstronggtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltstronggtrole descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltbrgtcreating elegant products begins with lots of prototyping and iteration to explore the problem space we care deeply about collaboration and feedback during the development process it culminates in careful attention to edge cases and error handling polished code and great tests to ensure that we ship a reliable product that never compromises data integrity or securityltbrgtas a junior software engineer you will combine learning with immense impact you will feel this impact from week one yes you will contribute code on your own during your first week ltbrgtyour development and success starts with our engineering onboarding program working closely with your dedicated mentor and engineering lead as well as collaborating with experienced engineers across dropbox in addition we have created many companywide learning and development events and programs to help supplement your learningltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtas a junior software engineer there are multiple types of roles and teams you may be a good fit for at dropbox here are some examples of roles and teams that you can have an impact onltbrgtltulgtltligtltstronggtproduct engineeringltstronggt build delightful fullstack user experiences that tackle real customer needs and help drive tons of revenue for dropbox as a product engineering intern you can expect to work across backend api desktop mobile and webltligtltligtltstronggtinfrastructure engineeringltstronggt craft the building blocks that let us scale dropbox to handle millions of concurrent connections hundreds of billions of files and hundreds of petabytes of dataltligtltligtltstronggtanalyticsltstronggt ltstronggtengineeringltstronggt measure optimize and build one of the industrys most advanced analytics platforms to derive insights from vast amounts of data our massive scale means youll work with more data than many other analytics firms combinedltligtltligtltstronggtmobileltstronggt ltstronggtengineeringltstronggt craft the dropbox client experience on mobile devices by learning and applying the ins and outs of ios and android sdk using kotlin and swift you are also responsible for building the backend systems that power the mobile experiences and optimize the protocol between client and server for reliability efficiency and speedltligtltligtltstronggtfront end engineeringltstronggt help keep our websites up and running by applying everything our application engineers do with the curiosity and interest in building fast scalable and responsive dropbox experiences for the modern web using technologies like typescript react and redux ltligtltligtltstronggtsiteltstronggt ltstronggtreliabilityltstronggt ltstronggtengineeringltstronggt ltstronggtsreltstronggt build the software and automation that controls the hardware to run our products work with a team who lives on the boundary of software and hardware and develop a deep understanding of the inner workings of our products our commitment to ensuring our products work well on realworld hardware in our data centers and serve as the first line of defense when something goes with our production infrastructure or servicesltligtltligtltstronggtsecurityltstronggt ltstronggtengineeringltstronggt people trust dropbox to keep their data secure and at dropbox we rely on our security engineers to make our products safe you are a software engineer with a deep interest in building software that is secure yet easy to use security engineers collaborate with product teams to secure our software production infrastructure website desktop and mobile apps and our corporate infrastructure and devicesltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtminimum qualificationsltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltligt years of fulltime software development experienceltligtltligtexperience writing or shipping software as part of fulltime work collegebootcamp coursework personal projects internships coding competitions or researchltligtltligtavailable to start in august december ltligtltligtpassion for learning solving problems and challenging the status quoltligtltulgtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is an equal opportunity employer we are a welcoming place for everyone and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work a big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like asians at dropbox blackdropboxers latinx pridebox lgbtq vets at dropbox women at dropbox atx diversity based in austin texas and the dropbox empowerment network based in dublin irelandltpgt
